div.p: This code system http://smart.who.int/refmart/CodeSystem/COUNTRYISO3 defines the following codes:

tr.td: the People’s Democratic Republic of Algeria
the Republic of the Union of Myanmar
the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
the Democratic Republic of the Congo
the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
occupied Palestinian territory, including east Jerusalem
China, Hong Kong Special Administrative REGION
the Democratic People's Republic of Korea
Kosovo (in accordance with UN Security Council resolution 1244 (1999))
Kosovo (in accordance with UN Security Council resolution 1244 (1999))
the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal
the Republic of the Marshall Islands
Independent State of Papua New Guinea
the Democratic Republic of Sao Tome and Principe
the Socialist Republic of Viet Nam
the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
